article.headline: UNLV 79, Wyoming 67
article.story: LAS VEGAS (AP) -- UNLV's Louis Amundson had 15 points and 13 rebounds Monday night and Odartey Blankson added 15 points as the Rebels stopped Wyoming 79-67. UNLV (9-7, 2-2) rode a trio of 3-pointers from Jerel Blassingame to end the first half with an 18-4 run and take a 49-30 halftime lead. Wyoming (10-8, 2-3) held the Rebels to just seven points over the first nine minutes of the second half to close the lead to 54-42. The Cowboys continued to chip away at the lead and trailed by only eight with 10 minutes to play before forward Dustin Villepigue hit consecutive baskets to help put UNLV up 68-51 with six minutes left. The Rebels were hampered in the second half when Blassingame saw only limited action because of a sprained right ankle. Wyoming's Jay Straight capitalized on Blassingame's absence, scoring 14 of his game-high 21 points in the second half. Villepigue and Blassingame each finished with 12 points for the Rebels, while Andy Hannan had 10. Straight was the only Wyoming scorer in double figures.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
